mapper.select: SELECT a.account_num, a.account_user_id, a.account_item_id, a.account_pw, a.account_balance, a.account_date, u.user_name account_user_name FROM Account a JOIN User u ON a.account_user_id = u.id WHERE account_num = #{account_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Account(account_num, account_user_id, account_item_id, account_pw) VALUES (#{account_num}, #{account_user_id}, #{account_item_id}, #{account_pw})
